INFO from megadeth.com
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

This DVD solitifies Dave Mustaine as a Rock Icon.
If your a big fan of metal guitar this DVD is a instant classic and
demonstrates some of the best jaw dropping metal guitar work around.
This live performance is flawless and the sound is excellent.
Filmed live in Phoenix (and b-roll footage in Tucson), Arizona,
Megadeth kick it off with "Dread and the Fugitive Mind",
where they show all the power and intensity that we saw through the TWNAH tour.
The main menu gives you 19 songs to choose from where you&#039;ll see
Megadeth the same way you may have seen during the TWNAH tour.
The second menu contains 5 songs, which are in black and white,
showing an "underground" sight of the same concert, with added interviews and
studio footage.
